recipesJson.name: Lisbon - Breakfast of Champions
recipesJson.author: KeedSpills
recipesJson.description:
Lisbon - Breakfast Of Champions	  
 
(coffee & strong Portuguese cigarette)
IIf you like this, here's another version: [Paris-Breakfast Of Champions](https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/22648)
Have added other bits & pieces, but to my taste at least, this simple base is solid as is.
Very customisable as preferences for both cigarette & coffee strength vary wildly;
From one individual to another. But also any one of us, depending on time of day!
Will probably work out creamier versions & daker versions (probably with a touch of FA espresso)
P.S. WARNING
these are pretty strong.
Try a 10ml tester, see how you get on!
I originally made these for when i'm having a drink, I like Brandy & would always have a coffee on the side, now I don't always need the coffee.
I soon noticed their worth as replacement for my habitual nutritious breakfast.

reviews.text: A simple mix but coffee and tobacco are undeniably a great combination.  Both Dark for Pipe and Up are a little harsh on the aftertaste but I feel like somehow the two balance each other out.
